name: Jacket Quest Part 1
description:
Save The Sea , Get the Jackets ! 

Join Jack and Fx on their Quest to save the world and Be King Of The Seas   

A Game By Rageway Studios 

Art by Juliana Ramirez  Models by Joseph Phantom and Calvin Harris 

King Leech : Robert Leach  Fx : Brandon Martin 

Directed by Jerod Bates Jr
